name: MULTIPLE_HISTOGRAMS
desc: Creates a histogram plot of x. Bins have a uniform width. Histogram displays the bins as rectangles such that the height of each rectangle indicates the number of elements in the bin.
label: Multiple Histograms

parameters.name: x
parameters.desc: Variables from database to distribute among bins. The variable should be Real, Integer or String. The variable can be either numerical or categorical. It cannot be empty

parameters.name: y
parameters.desc: Categorical variables from database. If not None, plots a histogram with a bar for each category in y

parameters.name: bins
parameters.desc: Bin of each variable in Json format

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology that the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed.
